meanings.sent1: The clumsy chef dropped the eggs on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She felt clumsy when trying to juggle the balls.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy clown tripped over his own big shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her clumsy attempts at painting resembled a child's first artwork.
meanings.sent5: The clumsy dancer stumbled through the routine, causing laughter in the audience.

meanings.sent1: His clumsy attempt to catch the ball failed miserably.

meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter spilled soup on the customer's lap.
meanings.sent4: Her clumsy dance moves made everyone giggle at the party.
meanings.sent5: The clumsy robot bumped into walls, unable to navigate the room smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The clumsy toddler struggled to walk without falling.
meanings.sent2: The cat looked clumsy as it tried to balance on the narrow ledge.
meanings.sent3: His clumsy handwriting was barely legible.
